name: Grapefruit Peach Passion (Flavorbook Entry Recipe)
description:
This is a citrusy and floral fruit cocktail with Grapefruit, Peach, Hibiscus, and Passion fruit.
Made for Flavor Book entry "INW WHITE GRAPEFRUIT"

-> http://nolife.link/inw-wht-grpfrt

(NOTE: All Flavorbook Entry recipes are meant to showcase a specific flavoring, and aren't recipes based upon final profiles)
author: ENYAWREKLAW

reviews.text: Mixed at 80/20 VG/PG. I definitely recommend a minimum of a one day steep. Fairly sharp throat hit immediately after mixing, but that's completely gone after a day. I get the grape fruit and passion fruit up front with the peach supporting it all with a juicy sweetness. Great recipe all around, I'll definitely be mixing up more of this one.
